changesList.changesDescription: [6ccda6c](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/6ccda6c): Experimental Feature - Added reference field filter
[33eaa81](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/33eaa81): Minor code refactor in reference field selector
[f59d67b](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/f59d67b): Media Manager - Make active item disappear on navigation and refresh
[daeeebf](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/daeeebf): Fix issue where clicking Search in the admin UI resulted in a redirect instead of loading the search results
[27bfe84](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/27bfe84): CLI - Adds client caching and cli flag to disable: `--no-client-build-cache`
[110f1ce](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/110f1ce): Fix `tina-lock.json` to not include search configuration, including search indexer token
[27bfe84](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/commit/27bfe84): CLI - Adds client caching and cli flag to disable: `--no-client-build-cache`
